dmca.title: pbdink.com complains of stolen copy
dmca.body:
Sir;

I require your immediate help concerning a website that has stolen our page copy. Our URL is www.pbdink.com and the offender is www.customprinting.com and they are using our copy on two pages: www.customprinting.com/offset_printing.htm and www.customprinting.com/direct_mail_fulfillment.htm.

They have stolen copy from our home page: www.pbdink.com and our direct mail page: www.pbdink.com/mail.html and have copied it almost verbatim on their pages above. I have further called them asking them to delete it and the owner basically refused to cooperate. I notified them a year ago or more and just recently but to no avail. I have further sent them a legal notice, as the call did not help and they have not responded to that either.

I have a good faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by the copyright or intellectual property owner, myself, its agent, or the law.

I swear under penalty of perjury, consistent with U.S. Code Title 17, 512, that the above information in this Notice is accurate and that I am the copyright or intellectual property owner of the copy on my website.

Please kindly look into this at once and I am asking that you ban them from your site permanently.
 
[private]
[private]@pbdink.com
